name: VIR-233.05  Verify that the following info is sent to the CRM after creating the Support Ticket

userStory.narrative:
As a shopper, I require the ability
to file a support ticket within My Account

title: VIR-233.05  Verify that the following info is sent to the CRM after creating the Support Ticket
description:

|info|
|Subject|
|Description|
|Type|
|Shopper Name to CRM for CSRs to review|
